activities: There are two activities that may result in the receipt of personal information from the EU. First, we may receive a copy of a client's database solely to provide technical support on the database software our clients purchase from us. Secondly, we provide software that enables our clients to process donations and capture personal information. A donor may provide information such as credit card and contact information in making a donation, volunteering or some other interaction with the client organization.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
